items.title: Show HN: Terminal Phone ‚Äì E2EE Walkie Talkie from the Command Line
items.summary: TerminalPhone is a single, self-contained Bash script that provides anonymous, end-to-end encrypted voice and text communication between two parties over the Tor network. items.title: Show HN: Deff ‚Äì Side-by-side Git diff review in your terminal
items.summary: deff is an interactive Rust TUI for reviewing git diffs side-by-side with syntax highlighting and added/deleted line tinting. It supports keyboard/mouse navigation, vim-style motions, in-diff search (/, n, N), per-file reviewed toggles, and both upstream-based and explicit --base/--head comparisons.
